comment: COMPLIANT. All verification items pass. Frontmatter: title is "Verification Record Template" (present, non-empty). revision_summary is "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1). Document structure follows established two-block template pattern consistent with TEMPLATE-CR and TEMPLATE-TP. Section numbering is sequential (1-8, with 6.1/6.2/6.3 subsections). No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found. Template placeholders use the standard {{DOUBLE_CURLY}} and [BRACKET] conventions. No typographical errors. Formatting is consistent throughout. Template content aligns with CR-089 Section 5.1 VR lifecycle (born IN_EXECUTION, no pre-review/pre-approval phases) and Section 5.6 template structure. Evidence standards (observational, contemporaneous, reproducible) are well-defined. References section correctly cites parent document and SOP-004. Recommend for approval.

COMPLIANT. Verified all review criteria with evidence:

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Verification Record Template" (present, non-empty)
- revision_summary: "CR-091: Interactive VR template v3" (present, descriptive, references CR-091)

TEMPLATE NOTICE (lines 6-20):
- Lines 17-18: "When creating a VR from this template, the interaction engine handles instantiation. VRs are authored via `qms interact`, not freehand editing." -- interactive authoring mentioned.

@TEMPLATE HEADER (line 23):
- "@template: VR | version: 3 | start: related_eis" -- name (VR), version (3), start (related_eis) all present.

@PROMPT TAGS (12 total, all with id and next):
1. related_eis -> date (line 66)
2. date -> objective (line 70)
3. objective -> pre_conditions (line 80)
4. pre_conditions -> step_instructions (line 93)
5. step_instructions -> step_expected (line 109)
6. step_expected -> step_actual (line 115)
7. step_actual -> step_outcome, commit: true (line 121)
8. step_outcome -> more_steps (line 133)
9. summary_outcome -> summary_narrative (line 149)
10. summary_narrative -> performer (line 155)
11. performer -> performed_date (line 165)
12. performed_date -> end (line 169)

@GATE (1 total, line 139):
- "more_steps | type: yesno | yes: step_instructions | no: summary_outcome" -- id, type, yes target, no target all present.

@LOOP / @END-LOOP (1 pair):
- @loop: steps (line 105)
- @end-loop: steps (line 143)
- Names match. Properly closed.

@END (line 175): Present. Terminal state defined.

FLOW CHAIN VERIFICATION:
related_eis -> date -> objective -> pre_conditions -> step_instructions -> step_expected -> step_actual -> step_outcome -> more_steps (gate: yes -> step_instructions [loop], no -> summary_outcome) -> summary_narrative -> performer -> performed_date -> end
Complete flow. No orphan prompts. No dead ends.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: None found (no TBD, TODO, FIXME).
TYPOS/ERRORS: None found.
FORMATTING: Consistent throughout. All tags in HTML comment syntax.

QA REVIEW: TEMPLATE-VR v2.1 -- RECOMMEND

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: "Verification Record Template" -- unchanged from effective version
- revision_summary: "CR-098: Update to schema v5 (align with seed per INV-013 CAPA-001)" -- references CR-098 per SOP-002 Section 8

SCHEMA V5 FEATURE VERIFICATION (all 9 changes from CR-098 Section 5.1):
1. Schema version tag: version: 3 -> version: 5 -- CONFIRMED
2. @end-prompt added to schema reference Flow Tags -- CONFIRMED
3. Separate date prompt removed (related_eis now flows to objective) -- CONFIRMED
4. @end-prompt boundary tags added after all prompts and gates -- CONFIRMED
5. Bold label prefixes removed (Objective, Expected, Actual, Outcome, Overall Outcome) -- CONFIRMED
6. "Pre-Conditions" renamed to "Prerequisites" -- CONFIRMED
7. Step heading format changed to "4.{{_n}} Step {{_n}}" -- CONFIRMED
8. Section 6 (Signature) and Section 7 (References) removed -- CONFIRMED
9. Flow simplified: summary_narrative | next: end (performer/date prompts removed) -- CONFIRMED

ALIGNMENT WITH SEED COPY:
Performed line-by-line structural comparison against seed copy at C:/Users/wilha/projects/pipe-dream/qms-cli/seed/templates/TEMPLATE-VR.md. Template body is structurally identical. Only difference is revision_summary (draft references CR-098, seed references CR-095) -- this is expected and correct per SOP-002 Section 8 traceability requirements.

COMPARISON WITH EFFECTIVE VERSION (v2.0, schema v3):
All 9 specified changes confirmed as deltas from the effective version. No unintended changes detected.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: Template body {{...}} placeholders are intentional template variables for VR instantiation. No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found.

FORMATTING: Consistent throughout. Heading levels, horizontal rules, comment blocks, and prompt tags all well-formed.

TU ASSIGNMENT: None needed. Template structural update with no code logic changes.
